response.original_title: The Thundermans: The Movie: Max Saves The Day
response.overview: A terrorist lives in a Thundermans superfan's home, and things go berserk when the Thundermans cassette tapes get stolen. It is up to Max Thunderman to save the day and stop this terrorist non-sense!
response.tagline: What you see is not what you get with this OG short film! A 500+ second long movie for 500+ subscribers.
response.title: The Thundermans: The Movie: Max Saves The Day
